name: Flappy words
description:
I had the idea of creating some educational games* and this is the first.

  • Fly through the pipes to spell animal names!
  • See what words you spelt at the end of the game!
  • Points!
  • Bird!
  • FREE!
  • Use in your class!

The main code and the pipe sprite are from Jalecko's wonderful tutorial here.

---

*This game is not really a serious attempt to create an educational game but to highlight what is common and in my opinion WRONG with basic "language learning" games.

  • Learn about my research and teaching with games over on the LLP journal website: https://www.llpjournal.org.
